name: isstream
description: Determine if an object is a Stream
author: Rod Vagg <rod@vagg.org>

scripts.test: tar --xform 's/^package/readable-stream-1.0/' -zxf readable-stream-1.0.*.tgz && tar --xform 's/^package/readable-stream-1.1/' -zxf readable-stream-1.1.*.tgz && node test.js; rm -rf readable-stream-1.?/
